title: 我想买双阿迪达斯的运动鞋

conversations.english: I want a pair of sports shoes,Adidas.
conversations.chinese: 我想买双运动鞋,要阿迪达斯牌的.

title: 我要为我的儿子选购双鞋

conversations.english: Hi! I am looking for a pair of shoes for my son.
conversations.chinese: 你好，我正在为我的儿子找一双鞋。
conversations.reply_english: Sure thing!Here we are!If you’re looking for dress shoes,we have several different styles of Oxfords for boys.We also carry athletic shoes, hiking boots.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然。如果你正在找礼服鞋，我们这儿有一些男孩的Oxfords款式。我们还有运动鞋，登山鞋。

title: 马里兰州政府还要收取5%的销售税

conversations.english: I’d like to buy these shoes.
conversations.reply_english: O.K. Let me see. That will be $104.99.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，让我看看。104美元99美分。

title: 我想看看慢跑穿的运动鞋

conversations.reply_english: I'd like a pair of sports shoes.

title: 我想买一双劳克式旅游鞋

conversations.reply_english: I want a pair of locus.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想买一双劳克式旅游鞋.

title: 你真的喜欢这种草帽吗 Straw hat

conversations.english: Do you really like this straw hat,dear?
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，你真喜欢这种草帽吗？

title: 这双正是我要找的晚礼服鞋 Dress shoe

conversations.english: Hi, excuse me, Sir? I’m looking for a dress shoe. My usual pair that I’ve had for years have finally been stretched out of shape. They don’t provide any support anymore.
conversations.chinese: 先生，打扰你，我想买双晚礼服鞋。我穿了很多年的那些鞋已经变形了。不能再支撑我了。
conversations.reply_english: Sure, what kind of shoe are you looking for? We’ve got strappy sandals, sleek high heels, edgy pumps, or if you’re looking for something a little more practical, we’ve got Mary Janes, ballerinas.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，你在找什么样的鞋？这里有用皮带装饰的凉鞋，高跟鞋，低鞋帮低跟鞋的鞋，或是如果你想买些实用的鞋在，这儿有Mary Janes巴黎舞女鞋.

title: 我每次都要花很长时间看好买哪双鞋

conversations.english: Hey Joe, what are you doing in this department store?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，乔，你在这家百货公司干什么？
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Rita, I'm just looking for a pair of shoes. I won't be here for long.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨，瑞塔，我只是想买双鞋。我不会在这里呆很久。
